name: Wombat ISE
summary: A universal 64-bit Operating Environment for Multi-Processor Machines.
short_description:
Wombat ISE is a step towards a virtualized Operating Environment.  Our goal is to provide a platform that will 
a) Revolutionize the Operating System playing field.
b) Provide an Completely Open and Free system for all to enjoy.
c) Embrace the community and welcome all.
We are going to provide a Hyper-visor Kernel that shall allow for the virtualization of any current/future system (virtual space station) and then allow for applications (virtual pods) to connect to the space stations they need to to run properly.  We will provide a Common Interface (OreOS) that will allow all of this to feel like one great Operating System.

OreOS itself will be a Game Engine designed Operating Environment that will be able to host the Wombat Ecosystem efficiently and seamlessly and will, in itself, be able to operate as a system itself.

Join the chat on irc ::
Server :: gotbrew.org
Room :: #WombatISE
/* Note the server automatically joins you to the main Lobby */
